data.comment: The match has started.
Can Shimizu capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Yokohama FC's half?
In the minute 2, Yokohama FC awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hiroyoshi Takayama awards the away team a throw-in.
Hiroyoshi Takayama signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Yokohama FC in their own half.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Hiroyoshi Takayama.
Ball safe as Yokohama FC is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 11, Hiroyoshi Takayama signals a free kick to Yokohama FC.
Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
Takashi Kanai (Shimizu) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Shimizu in the half of Yokohama FC.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Valdo (Shimizu) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 15, Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yokohama FC's Koki Saito breaks free at IAI Stadium Nihondaira. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Shimizu have a goal kick.
In the minute 18, Yokohama FC's Yusuke Minagawa goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Yokohama FC are pushing forward but Takuya Matsuura's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Shizuoka.
In the minute 20, Hiroyoshi Takayama signals a free kick to Yokohama FC in their own half.
Throw-in Shimizu.
Carlinhos Junior (Shimizu) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 22, Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Goal! Koki Saito gives Yokohama FC a 0-1 lead.
Great play from Takuya Matsuura to set up the goal.
In the minute 33, Hiroyoshi Takayama awards Yokohama FC a goal kick.
Shimizu make their first substitution with Makoto Okazaki replacing Valdo.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC close to the penalty box.
In the minute 35, Shimizu's Yusuke Goto is on target but unsuccessful.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Hiroyoshi Takayama.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama FC goal kick.
In the minute 41, Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Shimizu surge into the attack at IAI Stadium Nihondaira but Yusuke Gotoâ€™s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Yokohama FC at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 44, Shota Kaneko gets an equalizer for Shimizu. The score is now 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Renato Augusto.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Shimizu are coming forward and Carlinhos Junior gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Shizuoka.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
In the minute 45, Yokohama FC move into a 1-2 lead through a Yusuke Minagawa header.
Hiroyoshi Takayama has blown to start the second-half.
The away team have replaced Calvin Ray Jong A Pin with Eijiro Takeda. This is the first substitution made today by Takahiro Shimotaira.
In the minute 47, Yokohama FC awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hiroyoshi Takayama signals a free kick to Yokohama FC in their own half.
Goal! Yokohama FC extend their lead to 1-3 through Yusuke Matsuo.
In the minute 52, Yokohama FC needs to be cautious. Shimizu have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Yokohama FC in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 59, Shimizu's Carlinhos Junior gets in a shot on goal at IAI Stadium Nihondaira. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 60, Hiroyoshi Takayama signals a free kick to Yokohama FC in their own half.
Yuito Suzuki is replacing Yusuke Goto for the home team.
Junior Dutra is on a sub for Kenta Nishizawa for Shimizu.
Can Yokohama FC get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
Yusuke Matsuo of Yokohama FC smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 64, Hiroyoshi Takayama signals a Yokohama FC throw-in in Shimizu's half.
Yokohama FC have been awarded a corner by Hiroyoshi Takayama.
Takahiro Shimotaira (Yokohama FC) is making a second substitution, with Kazunari Ichimi replacing Yusuke Minagawa.
In the minute 70, The home team replace Renato Augusto with Keita Nakamura.
Teerasil Dangda is replacing Carlinhos Junior for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
In the minute 77, Yokohama FC have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Eijiro Takeda is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 81, Takahiro Shimotaira is making the team's third substitution at IAI Stadium Nihondaira with Ryuji Sugimoto replacing Takuya Matsuura.
Eijiro Takeda, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Yasumasa Kawasaki is the substitute for Yokohama FC.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC in their own half.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Yokohama FC.
Yokohama FC awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hiroyoshi Takayama awards Yokohama FC a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Hiroyoshi Takayama waits before resuming play because Maguinho for Yokohama FC is still down.
Tatsuki Seko (Yokohama FC) has replaced the possibly injured Maguinho.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Hiroyoshi Takayama.
In the minute 87, Shimizu's Takashi Kanai misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama FC goal kick.
Shimizu to take a throw-in in Yokohama FC territory.
In the minute 87, In Shizuoka Shimizu drive forward through Junior Dutra. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Junior Dutra for Shimizu drives towards goal at IAI Stadium Nihondaira. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Hiroyoshi Takayama.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Shizuoka.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
The match has come to a close in Shizuoka. The final score is 2-3.
Shimizu are back in the match in Shizuoka. Ryo Takeuchi has scored to make it 2-3.
